description: MatLab (or equivalent) license, a general description of related technical specifications, the SSC P2P portal registration information and the department details.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: MatLab (Equivalents) for Shared Services Canada**
===========================================================

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Reference Number:** SSC-23-00024536:T
* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-21
* **Deadline for Responses:** 2023-12-08T14:00:00
* **Current Status:** Expired

**Description**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for a license to MatLab (or an equivalent software) and related technical specifications. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing a high-performance computing solution to support SSC's operations.

**Key Details**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GDS)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Technical specifications and pricing will be evaluated

**Contracting Information**

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Clara Whittaker
	+ Email: [None]
	+ Phone: 343-553-8354
	+ Fax: 343-553-8354
	+ Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0B6

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers who are compliant with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Attachments**

Relevant documents can be downloaded from the following URLs:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/1225D967-C782-4D0D-966D-94E07D91E279
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/1FE05FE3-3D42-431B-8319-F18646687826

**Registration Information**

Prospective bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates and amendments. Registration can be completed at: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login. Please click "Register Now" to get started. 

Note: [Source: Supplier/Contractor] Rewritten to accommodate formatting, presentation, clarity, and to eliminate any duplicate or errant information.
